Title: CodeDemon Collaborative Code Review
Description: CodeDemon is a collaborative, web-based code review system that enables online reviews of changes made in Subversion or other revision control systems.  Integration with other SCM and Issue Trackers planned.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
CodeDemon is a collaborative, web-based code review system that enables online reviews of changes made in Subversion or other revision control systems. Integration with other SCM and Issue Trackers planned.

Using CodeDemon for your reviews eliminates paper work, ensures that defects, comments and decisions are recorded in an audit-friendly database, and provides a high performance (AJAX) workspace for actually performing code inspections.
